definition: considerate of the feelings or well-being of others
details:
adjective
- considerate of the feelings or well-being of others
- taking heed
= example: taking heed
= synonyms: heedful
- having intellectual depth
= example: having intellectual depth
- acting with or showing thought and good sense
= synonyms: serious-minded
- exhibiting or characterized by careful thought
= example: exhibiting or characterized by careful thought
